EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Products
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Products
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ products.
DuPont ™ manufactures a variety of products which are utilized in various industries.
To learn more about these products on our DuPont™ website, please copy and paste the following web address into your web browser.
http://www2.dupont.com/Directories/en_US/Products_Services_Index/index.html
DuPont Protection Solutions
